sqlMap.select: select * from comments where boNum = #boNum# order by reNum desc, reOdr asc, regdate desc
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS (boNum, userNum, content, regdate) VALUES (#boNum#, #userNum#, #content#, now())
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET reNum = LAST_INSERT_ID() WHERE num = LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS (boNum, userNum, content, regdate, reNum) VALUES (#boNum#, #userNum#, #content#, now(), #reNum#)
sqlMap.select: select sum(1) from comments where reNum = #reNum#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET reDep = #sum#-1 , reOdr = #sum#-1 WHERE num = LAST_INSERT_ID()
